edu.rit.pjmr

Interface Source<I,C>

  • Type Parameters:
    I - Data type for data record ID.
    C - Data type for data record contents.
    All Superinterfaces:
    Streamable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    TextDirectorySource, TextFileSource

    public interface Source<I,C>
extends Streamable
    Interface Source specifies the interface for a data source in the Parallel Java Map Reduce Framework.

    Note: A class that implements interface Source must be streamable.

    Note: A class that implements interface Source must be multiple thread safe.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Close this data source.
      Pair<I,C> next(int id)
      Get the next data record from this data source.
      void open()
      Open this data source.

      • Methods inherited from interface edu.rit.io.Streamable

        readIn, writeOut

    • Method Detail

      • open

        void open()
          throws IOException
        Open this data source.
        Throws:
        IOException - Thrown if an I/O error occurred.

      • next

        Pair<I,C> next(int id)
               throws IOException
        Get the next data record from this data source. The data record is being requested by the mapper with the given ID. The data record is a Pair containing a data record ID and the data record contents.

        The mapper ID is an integer ≥ 0 that uniquely identifies a particular Mapper. The source cannot assume anything about which mapper IDs will be passed to the next() method. The source is allowed to ignore the mapper ID, if it makes no difference.

        Parameters:
        id - Mapper ID.
        Returns:
        Data record, or null if there are no more.
        Throws:
        IOException - Thrown if an I/O error occurred.

      • close

        void close()
           throws IOException
        Close this data source.
        Throws:
        IOException - Thrown if an I/O error occurred.
